origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TeslaAPI.get_RnD_expenses', 'description': 'This function retrieves the research and development expenses of Tesla Inc. over a specified period, with an option to filter by category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which the expenses are requested, e.g., 5 years, 10 years.'}, {'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific category of expenses, e.g., autonomous_driving, battery_technology.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'expenses', 'description': 'The total R&D expenses for the specified period and category.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
我想了解特斯拉公司在自动驾驶技术方面的投资回报率。首先，请获取特斯拉公司过去五年的研发支出数据。
